experiences.title: Knowledge Systems Administrator
description: Redesigned outdated internal directory website to be fully responsive using HTML, CSS, and jQuery using a custom CSS layout.
Redesigned and develop three major internal applications using HTML, CSS, Flexbox, jQuery, and JavaScript.

Played a principle role in upgrade of content management system for existing knowledge base website and migrated over 2000 knowledge base articles to new system. Provided input with team on decisions of customizing UI and UX elements of new site.

experiences.title: Team Leader
description: Resolved intricate customer inquiries and escalated matters to improve quality of service and customer satisfaction.
Conducted side-by-side coaching to improve associate skill set, average handle time, quality, and associate adherence.
Created, reviewed, and updated internal procedures to enhance call quality and customer experience.

educations.name: Various Courses and Paths
educations.description: I have completed interactive courses in HTML5, CSS3, Flexbox, Git, JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, and other HTML and JavaScript lessons. I am focusing on honing my AngularJS development knowledge currently. I plan to continue learning in PluralSight for many years to come.

educations.name: Freelance Web Design Course
educations.description: I participated in an eight-week course designed to teach users to design, build and deploy professional websites from scratch using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Github. The course helped me solidify an overall front-end skill set, particularly in regards to Flexbox and Github.

educations.name: Associates in Web Technologies
educations.description: The degree program focused mainly on front-end development during college, with some classes in backend and full-stack development such as Mobile Java development, C++ development, and database fundamentals. I built websites mostly using Dreamweaver and Notepad++ during these courses.
